formName: Notification of change in name and or address of Designated Premises Supervisor (DPS)

props.navigateAwayWarning: Are you sure you want to navigate away? All progress in this form will be lost.

submission.message:
Your form has submitted successfully.

5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: staticText 5
props.content: It is an offence under section 158 of the Licensing Act 2003 to make a false statement in or in connection with this notification. It is also an offence under Section 33(6) to fail to notify the Licensing Authority of a change of name or address. In both cases the maximum fine on conviction is level 5 on the standard scale.

props.label: staticText 1
props.content: Please Note: You must provide online payment for this licence after completing the form. After clicking the submit button at the end of the form you will be taken to our secure online payment website. You can then make the required payment using either a credit or a debit card.

props.label: staticText 6
props.content: To be completed by the DPS

props.label: staticText 7
props.content:
Please Note: As part of the application process to amend the details of your Premises Licence, you must return both parts of your current Premises Licence, either in person or by post to:

The Licensing Department, Brentwood Borough Council, Town Hall, Ingrave Road, Brentwood, Essex, CM15 8AY.

Please include the reference number for this form, which will be produced when you submit it.

props.label: staticText 2
props.content: I {First_Name} {Surname} give notice of the changes in the DPS's name and/or address as shown on the following Premises Licence in accordance with Section 33 of the Licensing Act 2003 as specified below:
